constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 54 (Tuesday, March 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ROSENDALE:
H.R. 2162.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Congress has the power to enact this bill pursuant to
Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H1622]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

sponsors.fullName: Rep. Rosendale Sr., Matthew M. [R-MT-At Large]

title: Criminalize Fleeing from Immigration Enforcement Act of 2021
